backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining stories, users, profiles, access control, and core CRUD/query methods with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting PWA metadata, icons, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing app-shell caching, network-first navigation, and cache-first asset handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, splash screen, onboarding, drawer, PWA worker registration, and layout logic.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Displays an ad block unless the user is premium, supporting banner and inline variants.
frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Side navigation drawer showing user info, menu links, and premium upsell for non‑premium users.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top header with menu button, app logo, and user avatar fetched from profile data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with localized tabs and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Horizontally scrollable category list filtered by mode, navigating to category pages.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Shows last-read story with progress and navigation to resume reading.
frontend/src/components/DailyStoryNotifi: Dismissible banner announcing a new daily story, hidden for 24 hours after dismissal.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Prompts users to install the PWA with an install button and dismiss option.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Modal showing an interstitial ad placeholder with a countdown before continuing.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown to select app language from supported options.
frontend/src/components/LegalSupportPage: Layout wrapper for legal/support pages with back navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with status-based button labeling.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Toggle to switch between adults and kids content modes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Guides users through a three‑step onboarding flow to set language, mode, and theme, with transitions and skip support.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Provides direction‑aware animated transitions between onboarding steps with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Renders premium status badges in multiple visual variants.
Provides a popover with controls for font size, background theme, and auto‑scroll settings using user preferences.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Displays a dismissible reminder banner based on reminder state and hides it once dismissed.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Shows a share button that triggers async story sharing, records engagement, and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Renders the full‑screen animated splash screen with app branding, fallback icon, and loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview card or featured card with localized title, metadata, and premium indicators; navigates to story on click.
Shows a banner offering placeholder translation and updates UI after translation is triggered.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user avatar with optional image, fallback icon, size variants, and a loading overlay.
Manages global user preferences such as language, mode, font size, background, and persists updates to user state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Manages authenticated and guest user profiles, syncing preferences and premium status with the backend or localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Handles favorite story toggling and retrieval for authenticated users via backend or guests via localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, loading stored identities and managing login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Stores stories offline in localStorage, enabling download, retrieval, and removal with bigint-safe serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and tracks the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion setting via a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Captures the PWA install prompt event, handles user dismissal timing, and exposes installation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks reading history per user or guest, storing entries in backend or localStorage and providing progress helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Fetches stories, single story details, and the daily featured story from the backend using filtering options.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React hook that loads and saves user or guest profiles using React Query, local storage, and backend actors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining themes, fonts, safe-area helpers, and various animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Returns a cover image URL based on story category and kid-friendly mode.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Manages engagement stats such as streaks, badges, shares, and bonus unlocks via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI language codes to corresponding font CSS classes.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported languages and UI string translations for each language.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Provides kids-mode filtering and checks for whether categories are kid‑safe.
frontend/src/lib/notifications.ts: Utility wrapper for browser Notification API including permission checks and test notifications.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Stores and retrieves onboarding completion status in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/profileValidation.ts: Validates usernames and profile images/URLs for size, type, and formatting.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Handles reminder settings, daily reminder cooldowns, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Provides Web Share API and clipboard fallback utilities plus helpers to share app or story URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI language to backend language and retrieves story content or translation availability.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content using English as fallback.
frontend/src/lib/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages guest profile persistence in localStorage with get, save, and clear utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Renders the About Us page with basic app description and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays category grid filtered by mode with localized titles and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Shows stories in a selected category with language filtering, mode toggle, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Lists favorited stories or shows an empty‑state message.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Premium upgrade page with plan selection, benefits list, and simulated subscription handling.
frontend/src/pages/HelpAndSupport.tsx: Help and support page with troubleshooting tips, contact info, and social links.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Home dashboard showing featured story, categories, continue reading, ads, and latest stories.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumSuccess.tsx: Displays a premium subscription success screen with benefits and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the app's privacy policy using a legal layout component.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: Manages user profile editing, notifications, sharing, and premium/account status.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Implements story search with filtering, sorting, and story list display.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Handles story reading UI with language selection, favorites, downloads, and auto-scroll.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Shows the terms and conditions content using the shared legal layout.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker and checks for updates periodically.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata listing deployed features, polishing goals, and pending enhancement requests for premium, sharing, and notifications.
